app_descript:
Messenger

Brief:

Messenger by Facebook is your one-stop communication platform letting you stay connected with friends and family anytime, wherever you are. This feature-rich messaging app lets you send texts, make voice and video calls, and engage in group video chats, among many other capabilities. With deep integration across other social media platforms and a variety of customizable privacy settings, Messenger ensures easy and secure communication with your contacts.
